item.title: Mahomes avoided major damage to rest of knee
item.description: An MRI revealed, that besides his torn ACL, Patrick Mahomes didn't have any major damage to his other ligaments in his left knee.

item.title: MRI confirms Parsons has torn ACL, source says
item.description: An MRI confirmed that Packers star pass rusher Micah Parsons suffered a season-ending torn ACL, a source told ESPN.

item.title: Rivers to remain Colts' QB1 for MNF vs. 49ers
